content: call me london jumper is a love letter to london if you live there want to live there or used to live there this jumper brings you your favourite london things on your needles this top-down jumper has many colourwork charts with some additional and optional motives some wonderful motives crown guards and the black cab were added by the amazing stasia stasiacrochet /people/stasiacrochet ♥️ in the pattern you will find links to my short tutorials the jumper is knitted with jamieson and smith 2 ply jumper weight but you can choose any other fingering weight yarn for the sizes with finished bust measurement 80 86 91 97 101 5 108 112 5 118 5 1243 129 134 140 144 5 151 155 5 cm you will need estimated mc 6 7 7 8 8 8 9 9 10 10 11 12 12 13 13 balls estimated cc 2 balls of each colour for sizes 1-11 3 balls of each colour for sizes 12-15 needles 3 0mm / us 2 5 for ribbing dpns or long circular needles 3 5mm / us 4 for main colour dpns or long circular needles 3 75mm / us 5 for colourwork circular needles 80 cm / 32 inch or needle sizes necessary to obtain gauge gauge in stockinette st in the round on 3 5mm / us 4 needles sleeves 10 x 10 cm 24 sts x 34 rounds in colourwork st in the round on 3 75mm/ us 5 needles yoke body 10 x 10 cm 26 sts x 27 rounds **this pattern is published for free ** the pattern has been tech edited but be careful it has not been tested during the process of making the pattern i was diagnosed with multiple sclerosis writing and grading the pattern felt too much and i was aware of the responsibility that comes with it i realized that i do not have enough energy and desire to polish and finish the pattern i am giving it here for free this decision pushed the black cloud over my head away and i am really happy to share the pattern with you if you find any mistakes there or have some troubles please leave a comment or send me a message please be kind if you want to support the pattern share your pictures use the hashtag keep me updated or you send buy me a virtual coffee via ko-fi
